snippet.title: Code Alkonost: Beta Version 2024
snippet.description:
Step into the dark and haunting world of Code Alkonost, a survival horror game inspired by Slavic mythology. In this gameplay video, experience the eerie atmosphere, innovative mechanics like the "Sanity Effect," and a captivating story that unfolds through stealth, puzzles, and exploration. Encounter mythical creatures, navigate perilous environments, and uncover secrets as you embark on a journey to save the world.

Watch as our protagonist confronts her fears, solves ancient mysteries, and faces formidable enemies in a beautifully crafted, narrative-driven horror adventure. Are you ready to embrace the challenge and unravel the myths?

Stay tuned for more updates and follow us on our journey to bring this unique experience to life!
